description: Final state after add pivot - WebSocket rate limiting added to scope

issue.title: Add API rate limiting
issue.body:
Implement rate limiting for API endpoints.

## Requirements

- Per-user rate limits
- Configurable thresholds
- WebSocket connection rate limiting

subIssues.title: [Phase 1]: Core rate limiting
subIssues.body:
## Todos

- [ ] Design rate limiting strategy
- [ ] Implement rate limiter middleware
